overview:
Badhai.in is India’s first multibrand eVoucher service, which works across brand and hence make it an attractive preposition for Retail as well as corporate gifting. The four core premise for Badhai.in are

1) Gift sender must not be worried about the choice. Choice should be with the recipient. 2) Gift should be sent in quick steps rather than wasting hours in finding a gift, which might not fit into recipient scheme of things 3) Gifting across geographies should be instantaneous, without hassle 4) Partial contribution for a gift should be acknowledged. 5) Pooling for a gift or group gift

Badhai evouchers are completely electronic in nature and can be sent over email or phone. Recipients of these vouchers can claim it in parts across multiple affiliates that Badhai has tie-up with. These vouchers can be claimed against any affiliate, both retail and websites, over Web, WAP and IVR. The gifting and claim experience is on Web and Mobile, making it completely electronic and instantaneous thus useful in both planned and impulse shopping. Also some of the new age features are like Group gifting, Mobile gifting etc Badhai is offering to it’s users.
